original: @326b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @326b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: @327a * // aa gra tsarya pra ni dh'a na /
analyzed: @327a * // aa gra tsarya pra ni dh'a na /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam /
analyzed: mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam /
translated: The Aspiration of Supreme Conduct

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas!

original: skye dgu kun la sman dang bde slad du //
analyzed: skye dgu kun la sman dang bde slad du //
translated: For the sake of the welfare and happiness of all beings,

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas rnams la 'dud //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas rnams la 'dud //
translated: I bow to the buddhas of the ten directions.

original: de dag la ni brjod cing mchod par bgyi //
analyzed: de dag la ni brjod cing mchod par bgyi //
translated: I praise and make offerings to them,ðŸ”½And pray that all beings may reach the state of awakening.ðŸ”½Maitreya, Manjushri, the lord of the crown,

original: 'gro kun byang chub phyogs la reg gyur cig / byams pa dang na 'jam dpal mnga' bdag tog / chos kyi blo gros dpa' bo bdud rtsi gsungs //
analyzed: 'gro kun byang chub phyogs la reg gyur cig / byams pa dang na 'jam dpal mnga' bdag tog / chos kyi blo gros dpa' bo bdud rtsi gsungs //
translated: Dharmatosh, Shura, Amritakosha,

original: dpa' bo de la phyag 'tshal mkhyen pa ltar //
analyzed: dpa' bo de la phyag 'tshal mkhyen pa ltar //
translated: I pay homage to those heroes, just as they are known,

original: de bzhin bdag kyang mi dbang rnams la 'dud //
analyzed: de bzhin bdag kyang mi dbang rnams la 'dud //
translated: And in the same way, I bow to the lords of humans.

original: thugs rjer ldan zhing 'jig rten don mdzad pa //
analyzed: thugs rjer ldan zhing 'jig rten don mdzad pa //
translated: Those who are compassionate and work for the benefit of the world,

original: rgyal ba mi mkhyen mi gzigs mi mnga' ba //
analyzed: rgyal ba mi mkhyen mi gzigs mi mnga' ba //
translated: The victors who know nothing unknown, see nothing unseen,

original: mi dbang thugs brtse byams la gnas pa yi //
analyzed: mi dbang thugs brtse byams la gnas pa yi //
translated: The lords of humans who dwell in compassion and love,

original: rgyal ba de kun bdag la dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: rgyal ba de kun bdag la dgongs su gsol //
translated: All those victors, I pray, turn their attention to me.

original: sngon gyi srid pa dag tu bdag nyid kyis //
analyzed: sngon gyi srid pa dag tu bdag nyid kyis //
translated: Whatever evil deeds I have done in previous lives,

original: sdig pa'i las rnams gang bgyis bdag gis bshags //
analyzed: sdig pa'i las rnams gang bgyis bdag gis bshags //
translated: I confess them all.

original: de bzhin lus ngag yid kyis bgyis pa rnams //
analyzed: de bzhin lus ngag yid kyis bgyis pa rnams //
translated: And whatever I have done with body, speech, or mind,

original: de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags //
analyzed: de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags //
translated: I confess them all.

original: sh'akya thub dang mi 'khrugs 'od dpag med //
analyzed: sh'akya thub dang mi 'khrugs 'od dpag med //
translated: Shakyamuni, Akashagarbha, Amitabha,ðŸ”½And all the Buddhas who have perfected their activities,

original: de dag gi ni phrin las yongs rdzogs dang // chags dang bshags pa mkhyen cing rtogs gyur ltar //
analyzed: de dag gi ni phrin las yongs rdzogs dang // chags dang bshags pa mkhyen cing rtogs gyur ltar //
translated: Know and understand all attachments and confessions.

original: de bzhin bdag gis sdig pa bshags par bgyi //
analyzed: de bzhin bdag gis sdig pa bshags par bgyi //
translated: In the same way, I confess my evil deeds.ðŸ”½I pray to all the holy beings who delight in goodness,

original: thams cad dga' mdzad skyes bu dam pa dang // byang chub bzhugs pa kun la gsol bar 'tshal //
analyzed: thams cad dga' mdzad skyes bu dam pa dang // byang chub bzhugs pa kun la gsol bar 'tshal //
translated: And to all those who abide in enlightenment.ðŸ”½May the four evil states be quickly pacified,ðŸ”½And may I wander in the world destroying the unfavorable conditions.ðŸ”½The Buddha, the Lord of Good Conduct, the Stainless One,

original: ngan song bzhi po myur du zhi gyur cig / mi khom 'joms par bgyid cing rgyu bar shog / sangs rgyas bzang spyod dri med mnga' bdag dang // de bzhin lhun po'i dpal dang nyi ma sgron //

analyzed: de dag bsod nams yi rang mkhyen pa ltar //
translated: Know and understand all attachments and confessions.ðŸ”½In the same way, I confess my evil deeds.

original: de bzhin bdag kyang bsod nams rje yi rang //
analyzed: de bzhin bdag kyang bsod nams rje yi rang //
translated: And I rejoice in all their merit.

original: phyogs bcu dag na sbyin pa spyod pa gang //
analyzed: phyogs bcu dag na sbyin pa spyod pa gang //
translated: All those who practice generosity in the ten directions,ðŸ”½And likewise those who practice discipline, patience, diligence,

original: de bzhin ting 'dzin tshul khrims spyod rnams dang // shes rab bsgom dang bsod nams stobs kun la //
analyzed: de bzhin ting 'dzin tshul khrims spyod rnams dang // shes rab bsgom dang bsod nams stobs kun la //

original: byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo //
analyzed: byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo //
translated: I rejoice in all of it for the sake of enlightenmentâ€™s qualities.ðŸ”½The infinite qualities of all the victorious ones,

original: rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan mtha' yas dang // chos bstan byang chub 'jog bgyid thams cad la //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan mtha' yas dang // chos bstan byang chub 'jog bgyid thams cad la //

original: byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo //
analyzed: byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo //
translated: I rejoice in all of it for the sake of enlightenmentâ€™s qualities.

original: 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig /
analyzed: 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig /
translated: May all beings reach the highest enlightenment.

original: @327b 'jig rten rgyal ba gang bzhugs kun la bskul //
analyzed: @327b 'jig rten rgyal ba gang bzhugs kun la bskul //
translated: I request all the victorious ones who dwell in the world

translated: To turn the wheel of Dharma in the ten directions,ðŸ”½And for as long as space remains,

original: de dag ji ltar sangs rgyas gsol ba ltar //

original: rgyal rnams bzhugs shing chos mchog ston gyur cig / rgyal kun bskal pa mang por bzhugs par shog /'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig / mi rnams thams cad mchog dang bla med pa //
analyzed: rgyal rnams bzhugs shing chos mchog ston gyur cig / rgyal kun bskal pa mang por bzhugs par shog /'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig / mi rnams thams cad mchog dang bla med pa //
translated: May all humans become supreme and unsurpassed,ðŸ”½and quickly become blissful, gone-to-bliss, the lamps of the world.ðŸ”½Whatever is supreme in paying homage to the Buddhas,ðŸ”½whatever is supreme in rejoicing in virtuous actions,

analyzed: bdag gis dge ba cung zad ci bgyis pa //

analyzed: lus dang ngag dang sems las byung ba'ang rung //

original: mi gcig tsam gyi ched du mnar med pa'i //

analyzed: sems can rnam dag ye shes rnam dag dang // @328a * //
translated: the pure beings, the pure wisdom,

original: smon lam de kun bdag la grub par shog / bdag gi smon lam nyams par ma gyur cig / bdag ni nams kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur shog / byang chub mchog ni bdag gis thob bar du //
